section.name: 9 - Work
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Determine whether a force does work on a system and use this to determine whether a system is closed.
  • Draw energy bar charts for systems that are not closed.
  • Calculate the work done by a constant or non-constant force.
  • Use work to solve problems involving systems that are not closed.
  • Strategize how to solve complex problems involving multiple objects exerting changing forces on each other in systems that are neither isolated nor closed.
